posts.title: Beauty Bash is September 11th
posts.postTitle: Beauty Bash 2025: Uniting Beauty & Community at Birdies
posts.postDesc: Join RELUXE Med Spa on September 11th at Birdies for Beauty Bash: an evening of live demonstrations, complimentary mini-treatments, and community fun.
posts.postAdditionalDesc: Explore vendor booths, receive exclusive event-only promotions, and enjoy refreshments while discovering the latest in skincare and wellness.
posts.singlePostDesc: Experience personalized consultations, hands-on demos with our experts, and sneak peeks at our newest treatments—including FLATTOX™ flat-rate Botox pricing and our signature Apple Cider Facial.
posts.blockquoteText: “Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.” — Coco Chanel
posts.postExcerpt: Don’t miss Beauty Bash at Birdies on September 11th—your chance to glow, connect, and be pampered by RELUXE Med Spa.

posts.title: Something New Coming to Carmel in September
posts.postTitle: Celebrate Beauty Bash at Our New Carmel Location!
posts.postDesc: Join us September 11th at Birdies AND at our brand-new Carmel location (10485 Pennsylvania St) for demos, mini-treatments, and grand-opening specials.
posts.postAdditionalDesc: Tour the Carmel space shared with House of Health, meet our expert team, enjoy refreshments, and snag exclusive offers on injectables, facials, and more.
posts.singlePostDesc: Step into our new Carmel oasis—explore advanced treatments like Morpheus8 and FLATTOX™, chat with our aestheticians, and get a first look at member perks.
posts.blockquoteText: “New spaces spark new inspiration—come see what Carmel has in store!”
posts.postExcerpt: Be among the first to experience RELUXE Med Spa in Carmel on September 11th—beauty, community, and celebration in one place.

posts.title: Beauty Bash is September 11th
posts.postTitle: Beauty Bash: Now with Cherry Payment Options!
posts.postDesc: Celebrate September 11th at Birdies with RELUXE Med Spa—and take advantage of Cherry’s flexible payment plans on the spot.
posts.postAdditionalDesc: Enjoy live demos, mini-treatments, and unlock easy financing through Cherry for your favorite services: injectables, lasers, facials, and more.
posts.singlePostDesc: Discover Cherry at Beauty Bash: split your spa investment into manageable payments and indulge in top-tier treatments without breaking the bank.
posts.blockquoteText: “Pamper yourself today—pay your way with Cherry.”
posts.postExcerpt: Join us September 11th and say yes to beauty with Cherry financing available on all event purchases.
